item.title: Access Control
item.description: In this section, we will discuss what access control security is, describe privilege escalation and the types of vulnerabilities that can arise with access control, and summarize how to prevent these vulnerabilities. References Hacksplaining: Web Security for Developers Mind-Maps/Access Control Vulnerabilities All labs - Web Security Academy What is access control? Authentication identifies the user and confirms that they are who they say they are. Session management identifies which subsequent HTTP requests are being made by that same user.
